Hello devinflake.com

I think I’ve finally found a simple blog solution that works for me. Jekyll transforms plain text into static sites/blogs. I like that I can create posts from the CLI and I’m hoping to use GitOps to push this blog to my k3s dramble cluster.

I’m using a minialist theme called Ephesus by Hakan Torun. It’s simple and easy to customise but also has great code syntax highlighting. Ex:

This is interesting

There’s still lots to learn but this is a good start. Thank you Hakan Torun for the awesome Jekyll theme!

ephesus, jekyll, helloworld
Praise Raspberry Pi >
